text: Window to the East: Engage in transit trade by buying and selling Eastern commodities and Western commodities. You can also use them to bloster your troops
Whenever you complete a convoy journey to an order faction's settlements, you'll get an entrepot building
Valbrand's Horde: Capitol techs will be unlocked by razing capitals for Khorne instead of occupying them
Slaver: May sacrifice slaves to recieve powerful boons of Khorne and Chaos
Khorne's Chosen: Valbrand will directly face the Norscan Monsters
Dedicated to Khorne: Can only serve Khorne and other God options will be locked
Dedicated to Tzeentch: Can only serve Tzeentch and other God options will be locked
Has access to Chaos and Khorne Chaos Gift via Grimoire
